messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

network inaccessible sent monday belgrade re multiple polls down hello we have problem with have address can you check related with changed very urgent because we have best regards sent friday belgrade re multiple polls down you can resume normal monitoring router up running thank you sent friday belgrade re multiple polls down hello router was installed rack working upgrade software install licenses finish configuration etc let you know when finished thank you sent friday multiple polls down hello please be advised above referenced ticket was reopened attached automatic notification was received after monitoring polls check if would recover still testing down could you please further assist with thank you best regards analyst en ext sent thursday re multiple polls down hello everyone there any ticket open for two weeks we receiving needed help there any additional blockers thank you manager sent belgrade multiple polls down hello advised points have addressed setting correct hold details downgrading priority ticket should you require additional assistance please hesitate contact thank you kind regards analyst sent monday belgrade re multiple polls down hello everyone since we waiting for input rd party hold type should reflect be set awaiting customer response did we meantime receive licenses also since only ticket can be downgraded there actual impact end users thank you manager sent belgrade re multiple polls down hello please be advised since ticket hold for more than days marked resolved we have reopened ticket polls have recovered thank you kind regards analyst sent friday belgrade re multiple polls down hello router arrived but we waiting for provide licenses there impact router for back up connection thank you sent friday re multiple polls down hello everyone can ticket still active there any more impact we speak if if any further investigations needed please proceed through problem thank you manager sent re multiple polls down hello what have previous projects lead sent re multiple polls down hello per attached belgrade already raised with but we need provide id can you assist leader ext sent wednesday re multiple polls down hello replacement procedure should contain any technical knowledge correct understanding there knowledge concerning process replace faulty equipment covered by or teams projects lead sent re multiple polls down hi unfortunately kind action does fall under our responsibilities we have access training kind tasks we have dedicated teams trained for kind situations know procedure opening tickets with please note order be able communicate with there need be able log devices extract logs offer technical information we have hand type activities performed by for client related networking equipment there specific reason why procedure followed under current circumstances you need additional information what these hello there reason why you unable act below incident kind regards administrator sent wednesday re multiple polls down thank you you able open ticket with replace faulty equipment please clarify if router had any redundancy if can be resumed projects lead sent multiple polls down hello engineer advised router unresponsive changed cable but nothing happened led turning thank you best regards specialist sent wednesday re multiple polls down hello please let know equipment failed what nature failure networking hardware covered by we must leverage mechanism replace immediately faulty hardware course predicated premise failing hardware projects lead sent multiple polls down hello please be advised below details regarding above ticket ticket id reported outage location outage status ongoing summary multiple polls down impacted notified root cause yet identified technical resolution yet resolved latest update identified issue due equipment failure available back up up thank you kind regards analyst sent wednesday multiple polls down hello please be advised below details regarding above ticket ticket id reported outage location outage status ongoing summary multiple polls down impacted notified root cause yet identified technical resolution yet resolved latest update notified order check equipment ticket placed hold thank you kind regards analyst sent wednesday multiple polls down hello please be advised below details regarding above ticket ticket id reported outage location outage status ongoing summary multiple polls down impacted notified root cause yet identified technical resolution yet resolved latest update issue escalated with our senior engineers currently under investigation thank you kind regards analyst

message.reasoning:
**Identifying the Core Issue**

I'm currently focused on the challenge of accurately categorizing this IT ticket. I've begun dissecting the provided text, aiming to pinpoint the central issue at hand. My goal is to determine the most relevant category from the list given, ensuring it's an accurate fit.


**Categorizing the Root Cause**

I've been analyzing the text and distilling the central themes. It seems a router failure is at the heart of this. The problem involves installation, configuration, and troubleshooting of network hardware. After evaluating the list of categories, "Hardware" stands out as the most appropriate. I've ruled out others like HR, Access, and Miscellaneous as they are not relevant to this network hardware issue.


**Defining the Problem Domain**

I'm now fully immersed in the process of ticket classification. After a thorough review, my focus has solidified around the recurring presence of a failing router, networking issues, and the imperative for hardware troubleshooting. I've been weighing the nuances of each potential category and "Hardware" seems the best label for this ticket that's rooted in equipment failure and its repair. My evaluation considered many categories to isolate the correct one.
